website_summaries.verdict: While this unique powder won't work for everyone, it has skin-perfecting ingredients that are great for those who can use it.
pros: Offers the brand's award-winning formula, which contains ingredients that blur imperfections, like fine lines and pores
Works well for all types of skin
Doesn't contain parabens, phthalates, or sulfates
cons: Only available in one shade, and although it's translucent, it can look pale or chalky on some skin tones

customer_reviews.title: Not the real stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there is a big difference between the same brand/product at Ulta. I decided I would get it here because it was only $18 as opposed to almost $30. The fact is, it’s not the same stuff! It’s got a lighter color to it it’s not as natural looking. Even the actual powder, it’s not smooth or supple at all. Not happy. 🤨
customer_reviews.author: candicemrose

customer_reviews.title: Loving life and how I look.  No rocking chair for me
customer_reviews.text: I am a 73 year old who loves to be forward thinking in my appearance, both fashion and skincare. IT Cosmetics are the best line I have ever used. Most days I need only to wear the pressed powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the finish looks like velvet. It really sets the under-eye area nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible pressed powder. It really does make the pores vanish. This is my last step of makeup application, and when I'm done dusting this product on, the finish looks like velvet. It really sets the under-eye area nicely too. No caking either. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good powder
customer_reviews.text: I've always hated powder but this one is very nice. I still dont use it every single day, and I've noticed that you almost have to use more product than youd think to get the actual airbrushed look. I think its worth it for the price but still, not something I'm using every day. I'm weird with powder but it has helped, especially in the summer and I also have large pores.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: It Cosmetices Bye Bye Pores Powder Compact
customer_reviews.text: Like the way this product works for me. Disappointed container has such a small amount of the pressed powder; but I guess they figure the mirror, sponge, and flip top compact justify the price. Otherwise I would have given 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: gamerlove

customer_reviews.title: Crumpled broken.... Don't buy online
customer_reviews.text: Received powder crumpled and broken into pieces.... I am light skinned but gave me matte ghostly face.... I love their other products though.... Their CC powder is wayyyyyy better than this.... Don't buy online....
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Shine free and smooth
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this in my ipsy bag and was hooked. It makes my skin so soft, smooth, and clear. It takes away the shine for hours without looking chalky. I have brown skin and this works well for me without making me look washed out. It blends perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous and defective product!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The mirror in this compact is broken! Not just cracked, but parts of it that weren't glued in we're taken out, and the compact was put back into the package and sold as if new! I bought this to take on a trip, and didn't discover this until I was already there. I was not about to use a product in my face that could have bits of broken glass in it! Normally, IT Cosmetics Bye Bye Pores powder is awesome. This is not the fault of the manufacturer, but totally on the reseller for selling it this way!
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, even an amazon suggested product can be counterfeit. I could tell as soon as I opened the compact. The pressed powder was white when IT Cosmetics powder has a very light yellow hue. The powder does not look, apply or feel the same. As well as the product stamping of the component is missing from a crucial area. Do not waste your money. This is not the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lea Lamb

customer_reviews.title: No more afternoon shine
customer_reviews.text: This powder is amazing. My T zone usually gets pretty shiny in the middle of the day, and my old finishing powder would help for only about a minute before the shine came back. Now with this powder, one application in the morning is enough. There are still some days that my face gets oily in the afternoon, but I apply the powder again and I'm good to go for the rest of the day. It can go on pretty white, but it easily blends.
customer_reviews.author: L.K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is my go to powder, sadly it arrived in a million pieces, the shipping protection was inadequate, not the product. I am using the crumbs, and will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is authentic IT product
customer_reviews.text: This was to replenish the IT bye bye pores compact I previously purchased from Ulta. This compact is definitely not the same, neither is the product. There is a definite difference. The compact is cheaper, should have been the give away. But the product is clearly not the same, it has a fragrance, the powder is not as absorbent and it has a taste (when it dusts my lips, I can taste it) it is so obvious that this is an inferior product, it doesn't last for long on the face. Shiny within an hour. Won't buy again, as a matter of fact I will be picking up a replacement from Ulta as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Tesauro Gray

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Translucent Powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder does what the name says: Bye Bye Pores. It is very smoothing but not heavy. It does not show. I even use it sometimes without foundation underneath just to give a soft finish to my face.
customer_reviews.author: KWN

customer_reviews.title: Does not break my sensitive face out.
customer_reviews.text: Love IT products. Does not break out my sensitive skin ( Adult acne ) I have large pores on nose, cheeks, chin, product does ok with pores but need extra pore products to complete look. Love any product that does not break me out but will try other products in future for pore coverage. Product does come with a sponge to apply more product for coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Betty R. Powell-McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Not the real stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have a picture I went to ulta And Picked one up there because I was in the city and I have been buying this 1 this was my 2nd time and found out it's not even the same thing but in the exact same container The one from here is all white the 1 from the store is tinted
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: My fave!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cosmetic line! Have been using this powder for several years, its light, easy to apply, goes on smooth, and much better than your average drug-store quality powder. Long lasting throughout the day. Even coverage. Def a two-thumbs up! Switched over from Bare Minerals/Mineral Veil and I prefer this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: It's Definately White!
customer_reviews.text: This is very white and on me it goes on white not as translucent as I wanted. Very powdery. It does seem to help with pores a little. I get very oily and tend to have large pores. I do not think I will reorder
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. MI

customer_reviews.title: Powder
customer_reviews.text: I do not want to rate this yet. My wife opened it up and the powder looked like someone used a hammer on it. The container was not damaged at all. Just the powered it self. Any ideal of why? Thanks Terry S Lee
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the shipping of this product. Compact mirror was broken but I needed the powder and decided to keep it. That was a mistake. It was not at all like the IT product I have bought elsewhere. It was not a hard packed powder it got looser and looser and finally all broke into pieces. What a waste and disappointment. I will order my IT Cosmetics elsewhere from now on.🙁
customer_reviews.author: Clark W. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Hides the pores immediately
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It definitely does the trick and hides the pores. Its a tiny bit light on my very tanned skin but thats not a big deal. I suspect it will be perfect come the fall and winter when I fade out a bit tan wise
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder is so light weight and transparent. Works great. Doesn't irritate my skin. No weight to it. Puts a nice finish over my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria, VA

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it's authentic
customer_reviews.text: First, I received it broken and crumbled, second, it had a sponge rather than a brush when I buy it at Ulta. Won't buy on Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: talley

customer_reviews.title: It Cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: Bye Bye Pores Poreless Finish Airbrush Pressed Powder is one of the best product on the market. would not be with out any of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Von Bol

customer_reviews.title: Makes my skin look flawless and I am 66 years old...
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product many times and love the way it makes my makeup look... Will definitely order this again.. Thank you Ann
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I’m not a big make up person, but this adds light coverage to minimize my pores and reduce oily appearance without adding color.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Ulta
customer_reviews.text: I wear this makeup and it is exactly what I buy in the Ulta Store but buying it online saves me a trip to the store!
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Curry

customer_reviews.title: Light & lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: Light, don’t need to use much. Lasts all day. A bit expensive but It Cosmetics are generally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jw4ucla

customer_reviews.title: Chalky might work for others/ not me
customer_reviews.text: Chalky might not be real Eether way I don’t like it. Would like a study to find out if it’s real
customer_reviews.author: Jenn  Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Great powder
customer_reviews.text: This my favorite powder. Smooths skin an makes you look virtually flawless. I do reapply later in the day

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is the real product
customer_reviews.text: I use this IT powder all the time and love it but this product had a different brush/pad and the consistency isn’t the same. Not sure this is the real product.

customer_reviews.title: Badly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received product with a badly broken mirror. The glass Is getting into the powder. Not happy at all.

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product! It definately covers my pores without clogging or breaking me out. Though there is not as much product in the compact as I expected, a little bit does go a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This powder is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. One of the best powders on the market. I have very oily skin and this is my go to for photos and that t zone
customer_reviews.author: tricky niki

customer_reviews.title: Helps with oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I wish a product like this would have been available when I was a teenager. I’m 50 years old and still dealing with oily skin. Bye Bye Pores helps immensely.

customer_reviews.title: Powder
customer_reviews.text: This stuff work. It covers large pores around my nose and leaves a flawless look. Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent products
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with all products of It cosmetics. Will purchase again

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointe!!

customer_reviews.title: Great IT product but this one arrived all broken w/dust from the product all over packaging.
customer_reviews.text: A repeat purchase in the great IT cosmetic line! Flawless finish. This product arrived all broken up. I have used this product successfully for years but this one was crushed.

customer_reviews.title: WORKS

Would like another one sent and not be charged again...I m a good customer and this is unusual, I am usually very happy with products, but this was a mess ....can you do anything for me ?

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Horrible shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product as I have been using it for a long time. This one came in tiny crumbles instead of a pressed powder. Must have been handled pretty rough. I’m not going to send it back, I will just try to use it like a loose powder.

customer_reviews.title: I take it everywhere i go and highly recommend: )
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOOOOOVE this powder! It covers my pores so well and takes away the oiliness throughout the day. I have 3 friends who have already bought this after me bcz it really works SOWELL!! I take it everywhere i go and highly recommend :)

customer_reviews.text: The contents of the compact were essentially pulverized, not pressed. Totally unusable.

customer_reviews.text: Works well with my other makeup and truly does help minimize pores.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to makeup routine
customer_reviews.text: Love this product to finish your look. Looks natural if you don’t overuse it

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this powder. This is a good price and got here undamaged and quick

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This compact arrived cracked. The minute I tried using it it already had a crack on it so it fell apart within days of continuing to use it. I am very dissatisfied. I wasn’t going to say anything but decide to do so considering how much it cost. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Crumbly mess
customer_reviews.text: Broken chunks, not one solid compact. Very messy—not as expected. I will not purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this powder but for the money there was not ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this powder but for the money there was not a ton of product. Pretty disappointed. Even though I love this I may need to find so.ething else that gives more product. :(

customer_reviews.title: terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: The powder was everywhere!!! Totally busted. If I wanted loose powder that's what I would have bought. I have to put it in a zip lock bag to use!!!!! I would have given 0 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Product is sheer and kind to sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product under my cream foundation to tone down any shine.

customer_reviews.title: Powder Shatters!
customer_reviews.text: The actual powder is great, but 3 days after I received it, it shattered. And the packaging is awful. Especially for a $40 powder. :( I'll be returning.

customer_reviews.title: I love the product, but it shouldn’t have cracked that quickly
customer_reviews.text: The powder cracked, but I never took it out of the medicine cabinet except to use it in the morning.

customer_reviews.text: Package arrived already opened on one side and makeup was busted and cracked inside. Not usable now.

customer_reviews.title: speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, lives up to its name, seller made it easy and fast purchase! will buy again!

customer_reviews.text: Great Product, feels really good on my skin. Makes my complexion look flawless.

customer_reviews.text: I can’t live without this product! Well, ok, I CAN live without it,, but I don’t want to.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!! Thank you IT!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have used everyday this for years!! Really improves the look of my pores!!

customer_reviews.title: Great appearance.
customer_reviews.text: It does minimize pore appearance. Use lightly on old wrinkled skin.

customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. The perfect finishing after your foundation makes your complexion look flawless. Highly recommended. I prefer to use it with a brush although it comes with its own pad.

customer_reviews.title: Mine came perfectly fine
customer_reviews.text: It's OG. I got the sample in an ipsy bag months ago and sicne I hit pan I decided to restock it. I can tell its the same product.

customer_reviews.text: Great product I have big pores and always seem to have oily skin after a few hours of makeup but not when I use this product. A little goes along way only and never have to reapply throughout my day

customer_reviews.text: Very good product.It sets your foundation very well.Also helps hide your imperfections,and no shine.

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from It Cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Gives your applied make up a finished look. Not heavy but almost transparent. However shipping of the product definitely needs to be improved. When it arrived it was broken and crumbled. It was just sliding around in the box. It was returned and credit applied within a few days. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it cause it gives me a air brush look
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do like this product and would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product and would definitely buy it again, however, it's not as translucent as I had hoped. I have fair skin so it wasn't a big deal for me, but I can see it being an issue for someone with with darker skin. It goes on very nicely, is very light weight, and can works well as-is, for a no-makeup look.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: 40 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great powder but super sensitive. It will break into a thousand pieces if you drop it. I only apply once a day and it helps with shiny-ness. When you first apply the powder is noticeable but that goes away quickly so don't let it scare you.
customer_reviews.author: CALMOMMY3

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, Must-Have Product
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my third compact. I finish my makeup application each morning with a dusting of this power. I use a Kabuki brush to apply it. It sets my makeup, prevents shine, and doesn't cake or get in creases. It's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: MamaEtte

customer_reviews.title: My #1 beauty product
customer_reviews.text: If you want your skin to look flawless, this is the product! I bought a few of these for gifts because it's not heavy like powder. Very light and makes a big difference with minimizing your pores!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Way disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pressed version because the loose version is so messy. What a disappointment. The first time I used the product, the pancake disintegrated and exploded all over my sink. I could not salvage any of it! I usually love IT products but this was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: EDH shopper

customer_reviews.title: Pressed powder-huh!
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived the powder container was open. The pressed powder arrived looking like loose powder so I actually don't have any idea how it might have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Becs

customer_reviews.title: CHALK FACED!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected after the great selling pitch I watched that made me purchase it. It was as if I put chalk all over my face. I ordered the translucent/nude BYE BYE PORES PRESESSED POWDER. I am so unhappy that I lost that money on this and cannot use something this pricey. Did not do anything but age me with the chalky appearance and this stuff was all over my shirt and sink. They do have the best salesperson she is really convincing. Academy award goes to her. Would love my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to try this because I love the bye bye ...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to try this because I love the bye bye undereye. However, this, to me, is nothing special. It does the same job as a powder that costs $15. It also has a very thin layer of powder. About half of what I'm used to getting. It lasted 5 months with only 1 application a day. If I did touch ups throughout the day, it would've been finished a long time ago. I took 1 star away for the price, 1 star for the amount of product that comes for the price and one for not being unique.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I goes on the face easily and sets your makeup really well
customer_reviews.text: I goes on the face easily and sets your makeup really well. The only thing I am not impressed about is the price. I like this powder but I wish it was not so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Venable

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is way too light and I am fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: I Edior

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This am amazing product! I LOVE It Cosmetics!!!! This does exactly what it says its going to do. I use this mostly in the summer because I don't want as much coverage. It doesn't look super cakey like some pressed powders can look. It also doesn't have any color to it. If you are looking for color this is not for you. It literally just helps set your makeup and and make your pores look a little smaller. Exactly what it's supposed to do!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this product along with the same day delivery ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product along with the same day delivery and my product came completely SHATTERED! Unacceptable with the fact that I paid more than the usual price for this product! I'm very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: dvk

customer_reviews.title: It a good powder just not all that's it's hyped to be
customer_reviews.text: It a good powder just not all that's it's hyped to be. Far less expensive poweders out there that can do just as good a job as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revlon at the drugstore is better and a lot cheaper
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks, the product broke into little pieces. Revlon at the drugstore is better and a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carnall

customer_reviews.title: Flawless finish after makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The product comes in a compact of pressed power, not loose powder so you don't get more than you need. It gives a flawless finish to your skin after you apply the makeup without looking "powered" down. It's virtually invisible and blends/blurs the blush line away, not to mention filling in pores, fines lines and most of your wrinkles! It's a light touch with the brush after you lightly brush over the compressed power. Trust me on this, it will make your makeup look so soft especially when we get carried away with the blush brush.
customer_reviews.author: K nurse

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, I really feel like the people who don’t like it aren’t using it properly. I use a primer first then foundation and use this powder only in the places I have large pores. Small amount circular motion. I love it! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: I think it works
customer_reviews.text: I think it helps my makeup stay on longer and help hide my pores better. I also use this throughout the day for when I get oily. It’s transparent so you can’t see it when it’s on. Doesn’t ruin makeup coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer7

customer_reviews.title: A ladies must have!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled across It Cosmetics because of watching QVC. I tried the Bye Bye Pores because I watched the transformation of the models "finished," "flawless " look. Believe me, it is for real. The powder goes on like a dream. It is a good deal on QVC....... but an even better deal here. It even arrived quicker from Amazon. I am excited to recommend this to you.
customer_reviews.author: vernondoughty

product_meta.title: It Cosmetics Bye Bye Pores Poreless Finish Airbrush Pressed Powder 0.31 oz
product_meta.description: Experience your most skin-loving, airbrushed look from a compact! Developed with plastic surgeons, Bye Bye Pores Pressed finishing powder is designed to blur the appearance of pores and imperfections with Bye Bye Pores Optical Blurring Technology. The universal translucent shade imparts all skin tones with a silky, skin-perfecting finish, while the anti-aging blend of peptides, silk, hydrolyzed collagen and antioxidants pampers skin for a more youthful, airbrushed complexion. Can be applied throughout the day for on-the-go touch-ups, and doubles as a blotting powder, too!
feature_bullets: #1 best selling, award winning powder formula
Bye Bye Pores Optical Blurring Technology blurs imperfections for a flawless finish
Universal translucent shade for all skin tones
Anti-aging silk, hydrolyzed collagen, antioxidants and peptides!
